release_notes: BUG FIX: Fixed detection script 'cat: command not found' error by replacing heredoc with echo statements. Updated README.md version numbers to 2.51.1. FEATURES from v2.51.0: Full support for FTDI-based Stratux UATRadio devices alongside RTL-SDR dongles. Enhanced detection script finds both RTL-SDR and FTDI devices in unified interface. Setup wizard displays device type badges with hardware-specific constraints. Config builder generates correct docker-compose with device-specific mappings. Seamless multi-SDR support for mixed hardware setups.
